text:
Modibo Keita (31 July 1942 – 2 January 2021) was a Malian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Mali two times: from 18 March 2002 to 8 June 2002 and from January 2015 to April 2017. Keita was born in Koulikoro, French Sudan. He was a member of the Alliance for Democracy.
Keita died on 2 January 2020 at the age of 78.
